sources.title: Drum Taps (1933) KEN MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Ken Maynard, Dorothy Dix, Frank Coghlan Jr. 
 Director: J.P. McGowan

 Skinner and his gang are grabbing land from the ranchers. When they go after Kerry's ranch Ken stops them. Skinner frames Ken for rustling but the Sheriff is on Ken's side, and with the help of his brother Earl's Boy Scout troup they go after the gang.

metadata.Plot: Skinner and his gang are grabbing land from the ranchers. When they go after Kerry's ranch Ken stops them. Skinner frames Ken for rustling but the Sheriff is on Ken's side, and with the help of his brother Earl's Boy Scout troup they go after the gang.
